title: Manage Saved SOQL Queries
overview: Click Save Query to store the current SOQL for reuse. Later, click Select Query to open Saved Queries, choose from the list (ordered by most recently used), and run it again. DSP automatically parses the selected SOQL into the visual SOQL Builder for clearer reading and ongoing refinement before execution. In Saved Queries, you can relabel, update, or delete entries as needed.
generalUseCase: Build, run, and manage SOQL queriesâ€”all in the Query component.
